title: 2012 Summer Olympics
summary: The 2012 Summer Olympics (officially the Games of the XXX Olympiad[3] and also known as London 2012) were an international multi-sport event held from 27 July to 12 August 2012 in London, England, United Kingdom. The first event, the group stage in women's football, began on 25 July at the Millennium Stadium in Cardiff, followed by the opening ceremony on 27 July.[4][5] 10,768 athletes from 204 National Olympic Committees (NOCs) participated in the 2012 Olympics.[6]
